A template that showcases stereo content.

<b>Stereoscopy</b> is a technique for creating the perception three-dimensional
depth from a pair of two-dimensional images. It works by presenting slightly
different images to each eye, mimicking how our natural binocular vision
perceives depth.

Learn more about stereoscopy here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stereoscopy

Use the <b>1</b> and <b>2</b> number keys to toggle the left eye and right eye views.

import {DocsIFrame} from '../DocsIFrame.jsx';
import {DocsSource} from '../DocsSource.jsx';

<DocsIFrame template="4_stereo"></DocsIFrame>
<DocsSource template="4_stereo"></DocsSource>
